Rating.description: The rating of the company provided by the employees.

Company Name.description: The name of the company where the software professional works.

Job Title.description: The job title of the software professional.

Salary.description: The salary of the software professional in INR.

Salaries Reported.description: The number of salary reports received for the specific job role in the company.

Location.description: The location where the software professional works.

value_dict.Bangalore: The software professional works in Bangalore.
value_dict.Chennai: The software professional works in Chennai.
value_dict.Hyderabad: The software professional works in Hyderabad.
value_dict.New Delhi: The software professional works in New Delhi.
value_dict.Pune: The software professional works in Pune.
value_dict.Jaipur: The software professional works in Jaipur.
value_dict.Kerala: The software professional works in Kerala.
value_dict.Kolkata: The software professional works in Kolkata.
value_dict.Madhya Pradesh: The software professional works in Madhya Pradesh.
value_dict.Mumbai: The software professional works in Mumbai.

Employment Status.description: The employment status of the software professional (e.g., Full Time, Part Time).

value_dict.Full Time: The software professional is a full-time employee.
value_dict.Intern: The software professional is an intern.
value_dict.Contractor: The software professional is a contractor.
value_dict.Trainee: The software professional is a trainee.

Job Roles.description: The specific role of the software professional in the company.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in job salary prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the job, such as company name, job title, location, and employment status, please predict the salary.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in company rating prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the job, such as company name, job title, salary, and location, please predict the company rating.
